title: Broken Doors: Book One of the Carpenter Series, the Lost Years of Jesus
description: Abigail, a down on her luck widow, is barely scraping by when a random act of kindness from a mysterious stranger named Jesus gives her new hope for her future. Unfortunately the Romans have other plans for the pair-- and for city of Sephhoris. Will love and kindness prevail? Or will both Abby and Jesus be brought to their knees by their enemy? Only time will tell in this first installment of The Carpenter Series: The Lost Years of Jesus.
author: A.B. Clarke
